column14: In-person family visits will now be available at the Afflerbaugh, Paige, Rockey and Kilpatrick juvenile camps, where visitors must get their temperature taken in a screening booth outside of the facility. No parent with a temperature over 100 degrees or those exhibiting COVID-19 symptoms will be permitted to enter.
